events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for applying and we will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills mentioned in your resume.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your profile and will be in touch for the next steps.
We conducted an initial screening based on your technical background and experience. Your qualifications meet our basic requirements.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions. Your enthusiasm for the software engineer role is noted and appreciated.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-04-18 at 10:00 AM UTC. Please be prepared to discuss your coding and problem-solving skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The panel was impressed with your coding abilities and problem-solving approach.
We have scheduled your HR interview for 2024-04-22 at 3:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
Your HR interview went well. The team appreciated your candid responses and alignment with company values.
We are pleased to extend a formal offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the attached offer letter and respond at your earliest convenience.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the offer. Weâ€™re excited about the possibility of you joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer for the Software Engineer position. Congratulations! We look forward to welcoming you to the company.
Your onboarding process has begun. Please complete all required documentation and training modules before your official start date.
The hiring process is now closed. You are officially part of the engineering team and we are excited to have you contributing to our projects.
